    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Urs J Muehlematter and colleagues conducted a comparative analysis of AI and machine learning-based medical device approvals in the USA and Europe from 2015-2020.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Urs J Muehlematter|RESEARCH_PERIOD|2015-2020

    entity-entity relationships:
    Urs J Muehlematter|ANALYZED|medical device approvals

  proposition: Eric Wu and colleagues analyzed limitations and recommendations for evaluating medical AI device evaluations through FDA approvals.
    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-entity relationships:
    Eric Wu|ANALYZED|medical AI device evaluations
    Eric Wu|RELATED_TO|Food and Drug Administration

  proposition: Food and Drug Administration proposed a regulatory framework for modifications to AI/ML-based software as a medical device in 2019.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Food and Drug Administration|PROPOSED|regulatory framework
    Food and Drug Administration|PROPOSAL_YEAR|2019

    entity-entity relationships:
    Food and Drug Administration|REGULATES|AI/ML-based software
